entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 07:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
